Description: 9/1 Available! Recently finished 310 Chelsea St #3 top floor 3 bedroom 1 bath offers laundry in-unit, central AC/heat, tankless hot water, white oak floors throughout, stainless kitchen, custom tile bath, and a rear deck to enjoy the sunsets! First month, security deposit, broker fee due at signing. Renter insurance required. 73102 149
